maqras.text: Ta, xin. Zhexie shi “gulanjing”——panbie zhen wei de jingdian——de jie wen
shi xinshimen de xiangdao he jiayin
Xindao zhe jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, duxin houshi
Buxin houshi zhe, wo que yi wei tamen er zhuangshile tamen de xingwei, gu tamen shi paihuai qitu de
Zhe deng ren shi ying shou yanxing de, tamen zai houshi shi zui kui she de
Ni que yi feng dao cong zhi rui quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”
Dangri, mu sa ceng dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian yi chu huoguang, wo jiang cong you huo di difang dai yige xiaoxi lai gei nimen, huo na yige huoba lai gei nimen kaohuo.”
Ta daole nage huo de fujin, jiu you shengyin hanjiao ta shuo:“Zai huo de fujin he sizhou de ren, dou meng fu you. Zansong an la——zhong shijie de zhu, chaojue wanwu
Mu sa a! Wo que shi an la——wanneng de, zhi rui de zhu
Ni pao xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na tiao shouzhang wan yan ru she shi, jiu zhuanlian taobi, bu gan huigu.“Mu sa a! Buyao weiju, shizhemen zai wo zheli, que shi bu weiju de
Ji xing bu yi, ranhou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai, wo (duiyu ta) que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de

Ni bashou charu ni de huai zhong, ranhou, chou chulai ta jiang bailiang liang de, que wu eji. Zhe shi pai ni qu zhaoshi falao he ta de baixing de jiu zhong jixiang zhi yi. Tamen que shi youzui de minzhong.”
Wo de xuduo mingxian de jixiang jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
Tamen neixin chengren naxie jixiang, dan tamen wei bu yi he aoman er fouren ta. Ni kan bainong shifei zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Wo que yi ba xuewen shangci da wude he su lai man, ta lia shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta ceng shi women chaoyue ta de xuduo xindao de puren.”
Su lai man jicheng da wude; ta shuo:“Zhongren a! Women ceng xuehui bai niao de yuyan, women ceng huode wanwu de xiangshou, zhe que shi mingxian de enhui.”
Su lai man de dajun——you jingling, renlei, niao lei zucheng——bei zhaoji dao ta de mianqian, tamen shi bushu zhengqi de
Dengdao tamen lai daole yi gu de shihou, yige mu yi shuo:“Mayimen a! Kuai jin ziji de zhuchu qu, yimian bei su lai man he ta de dajun buzhi bu jue de jianta.”

Su lai man wei ta dehua er chayi di weixiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo changchang ganxie ni suo ci wo he wo fumu de enhui, bing shi wo changchang zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong, qiu ni jie ni de enhui shi wo de ru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
Ta ceng jianyue zhong niao, ta shuo:“Wo zenme bujian dai sheng ne? Ta quexi ma
Wo biding yanli de chengzhi ta, huo sha diao ta, chufei ta dai yige mingzheng lai gei wo.”
Ta douliu bujiu, jiu laile, ta shuo:“Wo zhidaole ni bu zhidao de shi, wo cong sai bai yi dai laile yige queshi de xiaoxi gei ni
Wo que yi faxian yige fu ren, tongzhi yizu ren, ta huode wanwu de xiangshou, ta you yige pangda de baozuo
Wo faxian ta he ta de chenmin dou she an la er chongbai taiyang, emo ceng yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, yizhi zu'ai tamen zou shang zhengdao, suoyi tamen bu zunxun zhengdao
Tamen bu wei an la er koutou——jieshi tiandi aomi, erqie shen zhi nimen suo yinhui he biaobai de zhu
An la, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, ta shi weida de baozuo de zhu.”
